Make Mashura with your parents or some close relatives and express to them your desire to marry. Ask them to try and find a suitable partner for you. %0D%0A%0D%0AMeanwhile, you should recite Salatul Haajat and engage in sincere Du?aa asking Allah to fulfil your needs.
